name: Forty-Two Judges of Ma'at
shortLoreBlurb: Forty-Two Judges of Ma'at is a spirits/class from Egypt associated with moral order, afterlife courts. Mediates funerary order and soul journeys.
description: Forty-Two Judges of Ma'at is a spirits/class from Egypt associated with moral order, afterlife courts. Mediates funerary order and soul journeys.
